Knife.description: A combat knife with a tactical grip, very sharp and clearly maintained with care. Suspicious for a kitchen.

ButterKnife.description: A dull butter knife, strangely sharpened to a dangerous point.

Drawer.description: A drawer partially open, containing what appears to be metal components and cleaning oil.

GarbageCan.description: A metal garbage can with scorched residue, as if documents were burned inside recently.

SoapBottle.description: An unlabeled soap bottle with a faint chemical scent, unlike anything commonly used for hygiene.

Cup.description: A cup with a bitter scent and a faint film that smells off — possibly laced with something.

Microwave.description: A clean microwave that smells faintly like melted plastic.

Egg.description: A hard-boiled egg with strange black specks near the base. Very out of place.

Shelf.description: A shelf holding a small black pouch, some gloves, and what looks like duct tape.

Bread.description: A loaf of dark rye bread — oddly untouched. Likely staged.

Statue.description: A wooden owl with hollow eyes. Hollow enough to hide something.

HousePlant.description: A cactus with a small camera embedded in the pot.

Vase.description: A sterile black vase, curiously empty, like the rest of the decor.
